column6: pt. 1 (of 2) When a beloved Brooklyn neighborhood deli owner is murdered, Clint Barton wants justice, leading Hawkeye on a trail of Russian mobsters, former KGB assassins, big secrets, a very old friend... and a very big surprise! 32 PGS./MARVEL PSR...$2.99
column8: | penciller (cover):Scott Kolins | writer:Fabian Nicieza | penciller:Stefano Raffaele
